name: Kidou Senkan Nadesico: Ruriruri Mahjong
summary: Mahjong game of the anime character "Nadeshiko". Equipped with an automatic level adjustment function, the computer monitors the player's labor saving severely for weak people and severely for strong people, and the strength of the characters is automatically adjusted to guarantee a hot battle at all times. In addition, you can enjoy it without getting bored with the free scenario system where the event changes every time you play. There are 30 characters. Every time you play the adventure part, the number of characters you can play in free battles will increase steadily. In addition, hidden characters are also available. Also, since the cards are hidden in various places, it is possible to collect and print out the cards.
